root.name: Feel the Magic XY/XX
root.description: OverviewFeel the Magic: XY/XX is a surreal minigame collection produced by Sega's Sonic Team. It was released as a launch title for the Nintendo DS on November 16, 2004. Its Japanese title is Kimi no Tame Nara Shineru, meaning "I Would Die For You." The game was followed by a sequel, The Rub Rabbits! PlotThe game's story focuses on a young man that spots the girl of his dreams, but who has no chance of getting her to notice him. At least, not without some help. Enter the Rub Rabbits, a bizarre performance supergroup that steps in to help the protagonist catch the girl's attention and win her heart. Tagging along with the Rub Rabbits, the player must take part in a series of stunts with the goal of catching the girl's eye, and then take her on dates, all with the goal of wooing her.
